mdRecord.dcterms:description: Observation about the president and rhymes. Declaration of presence. A date [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
My president is BLACK!!! | My lamb is blue | And I be GD if my [illegible] too | 5/12/18 | OLIVIA PEABODY WAS HERE
